desc: My husband and I opened a jewelry gallery in Williamsburg Brooklyn called Fitzgerald Jewelry and for 16 years I have been making jewelry and doing custom work through my husband’s gallery. However, during these 16 years my collection has grown so much that I have come to realize that it is time to create my own brand.

layout.text: Bubbles Blown on a light breeze, reflections of sunshine, sparkles and bubbles like diamonds coalesced in metal.
